title: Smoking: how to stop
creator_credit: Pelican Films, Jonathan Dana and Max Reid
brief_description: A dramatic film that follows the progress of a typical smoker as she gradually reduces the number of cigarettes she smokes until she stops. Narrated by Lloyd Bridges.
creator_credit_for_label: Pelican Films, Jonathan Dana and Max Reid
